seo: Weblogic,漏洞检测,CVE-2020-14882,预身份验证绕过,高危漏洞
summary: 该插件用于检测Weblogic服务器是否存在CVE-2020-14882漏洞，这是一个预身份验证绕过漏洞，可能导致未经授权的访问。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Weblogic server has the CVE-2020-14882 vulnerability, which is a pre-authentication bypass vulnerability and may lead to unauthorized access.
